main.name: Akkas Singh
main.bio: I am a foodie at heart, with a logical spirit, a knack for technology, and a passion for coding. Currently working as a full stack developer for Boston Consulting Group.Outside of work I am an avid cinephile, football enthusiast. I love to travel and really want to go around the world.
main.contactmessage: Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.
